EmailTemplate.name: Pocketflow Acknowledgement
EmailTemplate.subject: Automated Acknowledgement
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your request.
Your request has been received and we will attend to your request within: {!Case.SLA_Units__c} Business {!Case.SLA_Time_Measure__c}.
Important: Please respond to this e-mail for any future correspondence regarding the below case number.
Your case number: #{!Case.CaseNumber}
Pocketflow
